snippet: Fitch Ratings Ltd. warned Tuesday that Congress's failure to raise the federal government's statutory borrowing limit would "very likely" prompt a downgrading of the U.S. Government's credit rating.
abstract: Fitch Ratings Ltd. warned Tuesday that Congress's failure to raise the federal government's statutory borrowing limit would "very likely" prompt a downgrading of the U.S. Government's credit rating.

headline.main: Credit Rating Agency Warns of Downgrade if Debt Limit Is Not Raised

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
